pkgmetadata.longdescription: NOTICE: This package has been depreciated!==========================================As of September 30, 2021, ASF's beta HyP3 (version 1) service available at `<https://hyp3.asf.alaska.edu/>`_has been retired in favor of ASF's new On Demand service powered by HyP3 version 2.Programmatic usage of HyP3 v2 is available via the `HyP3 SDK <https://hyp3-docs.asf.alaska.edu/using/sdk/>`_.For more information, please check out the full HyP3 documentation at `<https://hyp3-docs.asf.alaska.edu/>`_.
